product_name: Lipton Darjeeling Tea, 500 g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: I will finish my review in two points -1. You will get the real taste of tea (No added taste) you may like or dislike it.  ( taste is not as strong as local tea so consider it before buying it)2. The color it produces is not as strong as regular tea  (the color is lighter than regular tea)Once you get habitual to it you will love it. I am not regular user, I am occasional user because it is costlier than the regular tea but I like it more than any other regular tea.Refer picture for product detail.Thanks.

reviews.review_title: Good price but free tea bags worth Rs 280 missing
reviews.review_body: I purchased this recently but was surprised that bundled free tea as indicated on packets was not delivered. This amounts to cheating the customer.

Took one star off due to missing free items. Amazon keeps the freebies for themselves!!!The pack says "Free 2 lipton green tea honey lemon 25s pack worth Rs 280" - the free items are not provided.Delivery took 4 days- usually takes 2-3 days.No doubt abt the product quality- Have been using this brand of tea for years- very good.
Seller has removed the free tea worth Rs280 each given as promotion from Lipton! Very very poor.

Very poor quality.I don't think the tea supplied is Lipton Darjeeling Tea.TheTea supplied is not worth drinking.Total waste of money.I never expected that Amazon will supply such substandard product.Shame on Amazon.

The Lipton Darjeeling tea over the years is gradually loosing true character . I am afraid i may break my sixty years of old association with your product. In my opinion Your tea tasters taste buds have forgotten the real  Darjeeling  aroma, flavour and taste. Do something to improve

Pure long leaf Darjeeling tea is famous for its flavor but not for deep red colour, generally obtained from Ctc tea. This tea has good quality of flavour but also generate reddish colour. Few years back when we could obtain "Lipton green lebel", the quality was awsome. In the present package quality is partially detoriated but still it is quite good. We can go for it.
Not out of the world but a decent flavored tea. People who like to take tea without milk may try this. To make a good cup of tea brew it in hot water for 5 to 7 minutes without boiling.
